channel.title: Empire 06
channel.description:
[center]Logo is coming soon...[/center] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,592980.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,592980.0.html[/url] FOR UPDATED INFORMATION! website: http://www.downgx.com [u][b]Introduction[/b][/u] Hey guys, I'm here to show a new rsps called "Empire 06". Empire 06 is going to be a stable ECO/PK server with allot of skills. By now most of you are probably thinking -
"Another 06 Remake that is going to fail..."
NO, Empire 06 is NOT going to be a 06 Remake. We are just an RSPS with 06 Gameframe. [u][b]Why I started this project...[/b][/u] I USED A CLEAN SHARD SOURCE [code=Update Log] Dwarfs222 - 2012/11/4 - Started project. 12/7: Worked on combat (50%) 12/8: finished combat (100%, like it was back then.) 12/9: worked on magic (10%) 12/11: worked on magic (75%) 12/12: Worked on prayer (10%) 12/13: Worked on prayer (75%) 12/15: Friend made me 75% mining 12/16: Finished firemaking! (100%) 12/17: woodcutting 80% (Have to deal with bugs) 12/18: 20% crafting 12/18: 20% cooking 12/19: 50% cooking 12/20: 40% crafting 12/21: 100% cooking! 12/21: Made some skill interfaces 12/21: Paused project till 1/5/13 because of vacation. etc.. [/code] [code=Bugs List] I'm currently testing with my brother and irl friend. We already found some bugs: -Duel arena very buggy -Some woodcutting bugs [/code] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5ezl20.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/n48lya.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aj9a81.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/vfjd3k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28tvuas.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20f5klk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/dxbkte.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ddktag.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/11k8if4.png[/img] [hr] [hr] Yes, we're going to use dropbox. ALL THE DONATIONS GO TO THE WEBSITE DEVELOPER/HOSTER. [b]I'm in need of a content developer.[/b] [code=Application Format] Skype: Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...): How many hours a day can you work?: Why should I consider you: Anything else?: [/code]

Project Rainbow

item.title: Empire 06
item.dc:creator: @Bluepike Bluepike
item.description:
@Bluepike wrote:

Skype: Bluepike1

Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…): Pikescape, Project Rainbow, Sagescape, SimplySimplicity (Coded for many RSPS) In addition to Java, I have experience with Python.

How many hours a day can you work?: School Days - 2 Hours | Weekends - 4-8 hours

Why should I consider you: I know what I am doing. I have the experience. I am a perfectionist.

Anything else?: Please feel free to contact me for anymore details. I am looking forward to working with you!

Read full topic

How many hours a day can you work?:I can work about 4 hours a day, but i am in christmas break so about 8 hours =)
Why should I consider you:I am a hard worker when I get my mind set on something i do it. I specialize in economy stabilization.
Anything else?:Even if you dont like my credentials skype me I can giv you more info =)

item.title: Empire 06
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[center]Logo is coming soon…[/center]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,592980.0.html FOR UPDATED INFORMATION!
website: http://www.downgx.com

Introduction

Hey guys,
I’m here to show a new rsps called “Empire 06”.
Empire 06 is going to be a stable ECO/PK server with allot of skills.
By now most of you are probably thinking -

"Another 06 Remake that is going to fail..."
NO, Empire 06 is NOT going to be a 06 Remake. We are just an RSPS with 06 Gameframe.

Why I started this project…
I USED A CLEAN SHARD SOURCE

Dwarfs222 - 2012/11/4 - Started project.
12/7: Worked on combat (50%)
12/8: finished combat (100%, like it was back then.)
12/9: worked on magic (10%)
12/11: worked on magic (75%)
12/12: Worked on prayer (10%)
12/13: Worked on prayer (75%) 
12/15: Friend made me 75% mining
12/16: Finished firemaking! (100%)
12/17: woodcutting 80% (Have to deal with bugs)
12/18: 20% crafting
12/18: 20% cooking
12/19: 50% cooking
12/20: 40% crafting
12/21: 100% cooking! 
12/21: Made some skill interfaces 
12/21: Paused project till 1/5/13 because of vacation.

etc..
I'm currently testing with my brother and irl friend. 
We already found some bugs: 
-Duel arena very buggy
-Some woodcutting bugs









[hr]

[hr]
Yes, we’re going to use dropbox.
ALL THE DONATIONS GO TO THE WEBSITE DEVELOPER/HOSTER.
I’m in need of a content developer.

Skype:
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...):
How many hours a day can you work?:
Why should I consider you:
Anything else?:

Read full topic
